trans-unit.source: Provides programmatic access to the <xref uid="langword_csharp_authorization" name="authorization" href=""></xref> section contained in the <xref uid="langword_csharp_webParts" name="webParts" href=""></xref> section of the configuration.
trans-unit.target: Fornece acesso programático para o <xref uid="langword_csharp_authorization" name="authorization" href=""> </xref> seção contida no <xref uid="langword_csharp_webParts" name="webParts" href=""> </xref> seção da configuração.
Essa classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization class provides configuration support for personalization authorizations for Web Parts.
trans-unit.target: A classe WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization fornece suporte à configuração de autorizações de personalização das Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: This class can be used to allow or deny access to Web Parts resources.
trans-unit.target: Essa classe pode ser usada para permitir ou negar acesso a recursos de Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor não se destina a ser usado diretamente no seu código.

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: Ele é chamado pelo sistema de configuração do ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: An instance of this class is available from the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization> property.
trans-unit.target: Uma instância dessa classe é proveniente do <xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.WebPartsPersonalizationAuthorization>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of rules used for personalization authorization related to Web Parts.
trans-unit.target: Obtém uma coleção de regras usadas para autorização de personalização relacionada a Web Parts.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule> object contains an <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Action%2A> property, a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Users%2A> property, and a <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Verbs%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule>objeto contém um <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Action%2A>propriedade, um <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Users%2A>propriedade e um <xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Verbs%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Verbs%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Users%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule.Action%2A> </xref:System.Web.Configuration.AuthorizationRule>

trans-unit.source: These properties can be set to allow or deny access to a Web Parts resource.
trans-unit.target: Essas propriedades podem ser definidas para permitir ou negar acesso a um recurso de Web Parts.
